data.event: The park was established in 1924 and is open seasonally.

event.title: is provided by the Lake Champlain Transportation Company Most years

data.event: Ferry service between Essex, NY and Charlotte, VT is provided by the Lake Champlain Transportation Company Most years in the past decade the ferry service has run year-round with exception of a few days of winter rough or ice filled lake surface.
